chefDescription: Chef Wang Li is a master of Sichuan cuisine, known for his bold flavors and fiery spices.

recipes.cookingMethod: 1. Cut the tofu into small cubes and set aside. 2. In a hot wok, add the ground pork and cook until browned. 3. Add the doubanjiang and cook for 1-2 minutes. 4. Add the tofu, soy sauce, sugar, and 1/4 cup of water. 5. Simmer for 10-15 minutes until the sauce thickens. Serve hot.

1. Cut the chicken into small cubes and set aside. 2. In a hot wok, add the Sichuan peppercorns and toast until fragrant. 3. Add the chicken and stir-fry until browned. 4. Add the soy sauce, rice vinegar, and peanuts. 5. Stir-fry for another 1-2 minutes. Serve hot.

1. Fill a hot pot with water or broth and bring to a boil. 2. Add the beef and lamb and cook until just cooked through. 3. Add the shrimp and tofu and cook for another minute or two. 4. Serve with dipping sauces.
